game.name: Battle Squares 2
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Battle Squares 2 is a twinstick shooter for 2-4 players. Play online with your friends, choose your weapons, and battle your way to victory! In Battle Squares 2 you can customize your own sprite animations, and the level editor lets you define the arena of battle!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Battle Squares 2 is a twinstick shooter for 2-4 players. Play online with your friends, choose your weapons, and battle your way to victory! In Battle Squares 2 you can customize your own sprite animations, and the level editor lets you define the arena of battle!
